sources.title: Out Of The Storm (1948)
sources.description: Jimmy Lydon, Lois Collier, Marc Lawrence Republic Pictures

sources.title: Out of the Storm
sources.description: Title: Out of the Storm Summary: A young man with financial problems works in the payroll office of a factory. One payday the payroll office is held up by an armed gang, but they miss a sizable amount of money, and only ... Directed by: R.G. Springsteen Actors: Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 11 September 1948 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A young man with financial problems works in the payroll office of a factory. One payday the payroll office is held up by an armed gang, but they miss a sizable amount of money, and only the struggling payroll clerk knows it. He's torn between keeping the much-needed money for himself or doing the right thing and turning it in.

metadata.Plot: A young man with financial problems works in the payroll office of a factory. One payday the payroll office is held up by an armed gang, but they miss a sizable amount of money, and only the struggling payroll clerk knows it. He's torn between keeping the much-needed money for himself or doing the right thing and turning it in.
metadata.Actors: Jimmy Lydon, Lois Collier, Marc Lawrence
